main event: A civilian observed a bright, orange-red object descending in the sky over Tucson, Arizona.
interesting points: The object was described as being larger and brighter than the brightest stars, with a light apparent like an aircraft, but much brighter in intensity.
The object had a sharply outlined appearance and gradually disappeared over the horizon.
The observer initially thought the object was an aircraft, but later changed their mind.
There were no photographs taken of the object, but the observation was reported to the authorities.
sighted object: a very large, bright, orange-red object in the sky
